name: Suspicious Process Start Locations
description: Detects suspicious process run from unusual locations
false_positives: False positives depend on scripts and administrative tools used in the monitored environment
query: (process.executable:(/.*\:\\[Rr][Ee][Cc][Yy][Cc][Ll][Ee][Rr]\\.*/ OR /.*\:\\[Ss][Yy][Ss][Tt][Ee][Mm][Vv][Oo][Ll][Uu][Mm][Ee][Ii][Nn][Ff][Oo][Rr][Mm][Aa][Tt][Ii][Oo][Nn]\\.*/) OR process.executable:(/[Cc]\:\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\\[Tt][Aa][Ss][Kk][Ss]\\.*/ OR /[Cc]\:\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\\[Dd][Ee][Bb][Uu][Gg]\\.*/ OR /[Cc]\:\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\\[Ff][Oo][Nn][Tt][Ss]\\.*/ OR /[Cc]\:\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\\[Hh][Ee][Ll][Pp]\\.*/ OR /[Cc]\:\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\\[Dd][Rr][Ii][Vv][Ee][Rr][Ss]\\.*/ OR /[Cc]\:\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\\[Aa][Dd][Dd][Ii][Nn][Ss]\\.*/ OR /[Cc]\:\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\\[Cc][Uu][Rr][Ss][Oo][Rr][Ss]\\.*/ OR /[Cc]\:\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\\[Ss][Yy][Ss][Tt][Ee][Mm]32\\[Tt][Aa][Ss][Kk][Ss]\\.*/))
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(process.executable:(*\:\\RECYCLER\\* OR *\:\\SystemVolumeInformation\\*) OR process.executable:(C\:\\Windows\\Tasks\\* OR C\:\\Windows\\debug\\* OR C\:\\Windows\\fonts\\* OR C\:\\Windows\\help\\* OR C\:\\Windows\\drivers\\* OR C\:\\Windows\\addins\\* OR C\:\\Windows\\cursors\\* OR C\:\\Windows\\system32\\tasks\\*))`
